body: Will 6.24 be out next wed/tues? If not when?

replies.body: path 7.1 is supposed to come out on the 8th of December (1 week) and the minimum run time of a patch is supposed to be a week(average 2), if its not out tomorrow its unlikely it would be out at all.
Well on PBE it says 6.24 cycle and not 7.1....weird
Well the thing is Surrender at 20 don't know if it's a new season until riot announces it (they haven't) so go the safe route of saying it's 6.24

>
> Well the thing is Surrender at 20 don't know if it's a new season until riot announces it (they haven't) so go the safe route of saying it's 6.24

well the they changed the start of season to 6.24 from 7.1, the new season still starts in a week either way
Right, so Camille will be released with 6.24 as well right, how much will her bundle cost with her skin? Will it cost 1837 RP? Just wanna be prepared

if her skin is 1350 its the same as taliyah's release deal
on Riots page it says season 7 starts on the 7 of Dec during patch 6.24
6.24 comes out on december 7 because it says ranked is reset on 7 th and the season starts on 6.24 meaning december 7, or i am just dumb
Hope its not out. Not looking forward to Rylai's changes.
I think so. I haven't been keeping track of the weeks, but they haven't been adding much in the PBE updates, so they must be near the end of the cycle.
